issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
!http://i.imgur.com/UbadHc8.gif!
Generated eucarc file for a system with several UFS hosts configured sometimes has service endpoints mixed with the different registered hosts.  Some services, like compute may be one host but other services such as autoscaling will point to one of the other hosts. To me it would be cleaner and make more sense to have all the endpoints consistent whenever possible.

Here you can see all the registered services and the eucarc file with a mix of endpoints using both hosts. The creds were generated on the CLC host (10.111.1.70)
{code}
[root@c-35 ~]# euca-describe-services
SERVICE	loadbalancingba	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.70    	NOTREADY  	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/LoadBalancingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::loadbalancingbackend:10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.70    	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	notifications  	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.70    	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Notifications	arn:euca:eucalyptus::notifications:10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	loadbalancing  	loadbalancing  	LB_116         	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:bootstrap:loadbalancing:loadbalancing:LB_116/
SERVICE	loadbalancing  	loadbalancing  	LB_70          	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:bootstrap:loadbalancing:loadbalancing:LB_70/
SERVICE	walrusbackend  	walrus         	WS_116         	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/WalrusBackend	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrusbackend:WS_116/
SERVICE	imaging        	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.70    	NOTREADY  	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Imaging	arn:euca:eucalyptus::imaging:10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	euare          	euare          	EUA_116        	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/Euare 	arn:euca:bootstrap:euare:euare:EUA_116/
SERVICE	euare          	euare          	EUA_70         	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Euare  	arn:euca:bootstrap:euare:euare:EUA_70/
SERVICE	reporting      	bootstrap      	10.111.1.70    	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Reporting	arn:euca:bootstrap::reporting:10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	cloudwatch     	cloudwatch     	CW_116         	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/CloudWatch	arn:euca:bootstrap:cloudwatch:cloudwatch:CW_116/
SERVICE	cloudwatch     	cloudwatch     	CW_70          	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/CloudWatch	arn:euca:bootstrap:cloudwatch:cloudwatch:CW_70/
SERVICE	objectstorage  	objectstorage  	OSG_116        	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/objectstorage	arn:euca:bootstrap:objectstorage:objectstorage:OSG_116/
SERVICE	objectstorage  	objectstorage  	OSG_70         	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/objectstorage	arn:euca:bootstrap:objectstorage:objectstorage:OSG_70/
SERVICE	tokens         	tokens         	TOK_116        	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/Tokens	arn:euca:bootstrap:tokens:tokens:TOK_116/
SERVICE	tokens         	tokens         	TOK_70         	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Tokens 	arn:euca:bootstrap:tokens:tokens:TOK_70/
SERVICE	cloudwatchbacke	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.70    	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/CloudWatchBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::cloudwatchbackend:10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	autoscalingback	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.70    	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/AutoScalingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::autoscalingbackend:10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	jetty          	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.70    	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Jetty  	arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	compute        	compute        	COM_116        	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/compute	arn:euca:bootstrap:compute:compute:COM_116/
SERVICE	compute        	compute        	COM_70         	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/compute	arn:euca:bootstrap:compute:compute:COM_70/
SERVICE	autoscaling    	autoscaling    	AS_116         	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:bootstrap:autoscaling:autoscaling:AS_116/
SERVICE	autoscaling    	autoscaling    	AS_70          	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:bootstrap:autoscaling:autoscaling:AS_70/
SERVICE	dns            	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.70    	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Dns    	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	bootstrap      	bootstrap      	10.111.1.70    	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Empyrean	arn:euca:bootstrap:::10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI00        	SC_116         	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_116/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI00        	CC_116         	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_116/
[root@c-35 ~]# cat eucarc
EUCA_KEY_DIR=$(cd $(dirname ${BASH_SOURCE:-$0}); pwd -P)
export EC2_URL=http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/compute
export S3_URL=http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/objectstorage
export EUARE_URL=http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Euare
export TOKEN_URL=http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Tokens
export AWS_AUTO_SCALING_URL=http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/AutoScaling
export AWS_CLOUDWATCH_URL=http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/CloudWatch
export AWS_ELB_URL=http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/LoadBalancing
export EUSTORE_URL=http://emis.eucalyptus.com/
export EC2_PRIVATE_KEY=${EUCA_KEY_DIR}/euca2-admin-a31a6b4f-pk.pem
export EC2_CERT=${EUCA_KEY_DIR}/euca2-admin-a31a6b4f-cert.pem
export EC2_JVM_ARGS=-Djavax.net.ssl.trustStore=${EUCA_KEY_DIR}/jssecacerts
export EUCALYPTUS_CERT=${EUCA_KEY_DIR}/cloud-cert.pem
export EC2_ACCOUNT_NUMBER='173116109653'
export EC2_ACCESS_KEY='AKI9QFYK3AZ9W4NN9GDU'
export EC2_SECRET_KEY='GCJBY0wS2kWhDO9A4bSYRUFSHFqZRrLTGNgZHxq7'
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY='AKI9QFYK3AZ9W4NN9GDU'
export AWS_SECRET_KEY='GCJBY0wS2kWhDO9A4bSYRUFSHFqZRrLTGNgZHxq7'
export AWS_CREDENTIAL_FILE=${EUCA_KEY_DIR}/iamrc
export EC2_USER_ID='173116109653'
alias ec2-bundle-image="ec2-bundle-image --cert ${EC2_CERT} --privatekey ${EC2_PRIVATE_KEY} --user ${EC2_ACCOUNT_NUMBER} --ec2cert ${EUCALYPTUS_CERT}"
alias ec2-upload-bundle="ec2-upload-bundle -a ${EC2_ACCESS_KEY} -s ${EC2_SECRET_KEY} --url ${S3_URL}"
{code}

Topology:
\[CLC UFS\]
\[UFS WS CC SC\]
\[NC\]

comments.body: With UFS, dns will need to be implemented or deployed in the eucarc
